description: Gets a business glossary in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which this business glossary exists.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the business glossary.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when this business glossary was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who created this business glossary.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the business glossary.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which this business glossary exists.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the business glossary.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the business glossary.

nested_items.name: owningProjectId
nested_items.description: The ID of the project that owns this business glossary.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the business glossary.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the business glossary was updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who updated the business glossary.
